players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked that Diana was killed last night. We need to be vigilant and discuss any suspicions."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she's the mafia. We should vote for her to protect the town."
You: "I didn't do it! Charlie is probably the mafia trying to frame me. We should vote for him instead."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. Her accusation is a bluff to save herself. Bob, join me in voting for her to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice
